runs.comm: goes through first slip! Flighted outside off, Amla drove firmly and a thick outside edge went to the left of Maqsood at first slip but he hardly moves to catch it
pitches it up and Amla drives it beautifully through the covers for four
on length outside off, Amla drives again and between cover and point for one
flighted on middle, de Kock leans forward to defend
flighted on off, driven down to long-off for one
onto the pads, Amla chips is over the infield to deep midwicket for one
short of length on middle and leg, Amla defends off the back foot
short of length outside off at 145.5kph, Amla slashed hard but the extra bounce went over the bat
on length and closer to off, Amla runs it down to third man
angled into the pads, steered to square leg for two
short of length outside off, de Kock cuts and doesn't get the middle of the bat
fuller on middle, driven back to Irfan who does well to stop with his left hand
outside off, Amla didn't move much and creamed it through square on the off side with beautiful timing
Amla goes! He moved across to whip it on the leg side but Tanvir pitched it on leg and Amla had moved too far across to get bat on it and the ball hits leg stump
angles it in from outside off, Faf leaves it alone
on length and coming in, the batsman leans forward and defends

short ball, du Plessis pulls it to deep fine leg and it would've been a regulation catch for Irfan but he was well inside the boundary rope. He misjudged it and had he stayed back, the tall man would have taken it comfortably
on length coming in, Faf defends off the front foot
back of length on off and coming in, de Kock turns it towards deep square leg for two
de Kock makes room but can't get this short of length ball past cover
short outside off, not much room for de Kock who pulls and it goes to mid-on
bouncer goes past de Kock's head as he tried to pull but couldn't connect
short of length and coming in, inside edge goes towards Tanvir at short fine leg and he fumbles twice but can't stop it. The deep backward square leg fielder comes to the rescue
short of length on off, tucks it to midwicket
from wide of the crease round the wicket, Faf flicks the full delivery to deep midwicket
full on off, de Kock makes room and lofts it down the ground. He didn't middle it and it was just out of mid-off's reach
full outside off and de Kock crashed this one through the covers. Nobody moved an inch as it raced away to the boundary
short of length outside off, de Kock cuts to third man
angled in from outside off, Faf takes a step towards the pitch of the ball and drove it crisply through the covers with excellent timing
full outside off, defends it wide of point with soft hands for a single
full on off and middle, tucked to midwicket for a quick single
short of length towards off, turned to backward square leg
full on middle and leg, defends on the front foot
short of length outside off, pushed to cover
Faf makes room and Ajmal bowls towards leg, pushed to midwicket
flighted outside off, driven to point by Faf
short ball outside off, pushed down to long-off
short of length and quick towards off, driven to cover
fuller on off, pushed to point with soft hands
short ball going down the leg side, Faf came down and pulled it to the fine leg boundary for four
short of length outside off, Faf comes down and pushes it wide of cover for one
quicker one outside off goes past the outside edge
length ball turning towards leg, defended to midwicket
fullish ball on middle, turned to midwicket
takes a step down and pushes it to mid-on
makes room and works the full delivery to midwicket again
length ball turning into the pads, tucked to square leg and they take a quick single
full outside off, pushed to point
full ball on the stumps, driven down to long-on for one
on length outside off, de Kock cuts it after the turn
flat and short on the stumps, defends it back to the bowler
the googly goes through Faf after pitching on off and there's an appeal for lbw but it was probably going down leg
on length outside off, driven to deep cover
on length on the stumps, pushed down to long-on
turning towards leg from middle, tucked to square leg with the turn
makes room but can't get it past square leg again
length ball on off, Faf defends it back to the bowler
Faf makes room, Ajmal bowls down leg and it's pushed to mid-on now
comes down the ground to drive it back to Ajmal
comes down again and chips it with a whip over the infield on the leg side and they take two
length delivery on off, cut to point for a quick single
on length on off, Faf gets his left leg forward and scoops it fine on the leg side for one
skidding in from off, pushed on the leg side
comes downy the track and drives it firmly to long-on
makes room and the ball chases him, Faf lofts the short of length ball towards deep midwicket
flatter delivery around middle and leg, pushed down back to the bowler
on length outside off, Faf scoops it right over the keeper's head for four. Connected well for this unorthodox shot
takes a step own and whips it to deep midwicket
length ball on off, defends it back to the bowler
dances down the ground and he's smoked it! It was on length but de Kock converted it to a full delivery and smacked it with the turn to the deep midwicket boundary
short of length around off, pulled to deep midwicket for one
now Faf goes all the way! It was flighted on off, Faf made room and launched this full delivery straight down the ground for maximum
short of length on middle, de Kock stays back and whips it to the wide long-on boundary for two
he's middling them very well. This wasn't too full but de Kock went down on one knee and slog-swept it over the midwicket fielder for six more
slogs again on the leg side and this one falls short of long-on
short of length on off, worked to deep midwicket for one
flat and full on leg, de Kock makes room but gets a bottom edge
full outside off, driven down to long-off for one
length ball on off, pushed towards cover with soft hands
full and turning into leg, tucked on the leg side for a quick one
flat ball coming into the batsman who defends
flighted on off, de Kock made room and swept it from the middle of the bat to the wide long on boundary for four along the ground
short of length on leg, steered to deep midwicket
on length on off, Faf defends it on leg with the turn
short of length outside off, de Kock goes back and cuts it late past short third man for four
slower outside off, slapped to long-on
full outside off and Faf drives it down the ground to long-off to seal the chase
